text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ito'ati Alloh va Pajomʙar va ululamri musalmonon kuned va har kas ki Pajomʙarro pajravī kunad, Allohro pajravī kardaast. Ammo mas'ulin va hukamo zamone ʙa farmon ʙurdan az onho dastur doda meşavad, ki farmoni onho gunoh naʙoşad. Va cun dar cize ixtilof karded, onro ʙa Alloh va Pajomʙar ʙargardoned, agar ʙa Alloh va rūzi qijomat imon dored, in ʙaroi şumo ʙehtar va xuştar ast
